product.shortDescription: Tried and trusted since 1958, the Silhouette collection is a timeless classic rooted in our legacy. We’ve updated the time-honored sleek luggage style by combining the distinct elements from our hardside but with the flexibility of a softside. Our carry-on offers a strong, rigid design with multiple interior and exterior pockets. To keep you well-organized, we’ve included a 3-1-1 WetPakTM and TecKit Pouch to conveniently fit in the front slip pocket and keep your tech accessories within reach. A bonus slip pocket provides space for your laptop or tablet. And the proprietary molded bottom is made with fiberglass to keep your luggage strong and light. Mix, match, and create your set with any luggage or bag from our Silhouette 18 collection.

product.headlineDescription:
Our carry-on offers a strong, rigid design with multiple interior and exterior pockets. To keep you well-organized, we’ve included a 3-1-1 WetPakTM and TecKit Pouch to conveniently fit in the front slip pocket and keep your tech accessories within reach.

  • Overall Dimensions: 23.25 in. x 15 in. x 10 in.
  • Weight: 8.29 lbs.
